CustomField.description: Set the Account Type based on total amount on Won opportunities
CustomField.formula: IF( Total_Amount_of_Won_Opportunities__c > 50000 , 'GOLD', IF( Total_Amount_of_Won_Opportunities__c > 25000 , 'SILVER', IF( Total_Amount_of_Won_Opportunities__c > 10000 , 'BRONZE', '' )))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Set the Account Type based on total amount on Won opportunities
CustomField.label: Account Type
